summary: This is an email from an FBI agent in the Crimes Against Children/Human Trafficking unit in New York, informing a colleague that a grand jury has returned a true bill (indictment) against Ghislaine Maxwell and that they are in the process of obtaining a GPS warrant. It marks a key procedural step in the federal investigation leading to her arrest.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The email subject and body indicate she is the target of a grand jury indictment ('true bill') and a pending GPS warrant.

events.title: Grand Jury returns true bill against Maxwell
events.description: A grand jury has returned a true bill (indictment) against Ghislaine Maxwell, and FBI agents are proceeding to obtain a GPS warrant.

keyFacts: A federal grand jury returned a true bill (indictment) against Ghislaine Maxwell as of June 29, 2020.
The FBI's Crimes Against Children/Human Trafficking unit in New York was actively working to obtain a GPS warrant for Maxwell following the indictment.
The email indicates the investigation was at a critical, pre-arrest stage, moving from indictment to surveillance/tracking warrant procurement.
